insurer: Botswana Public Officers Medical Aid Scheme (BPOMAS)

plans.co_payment: No 10% co-payment; scheme absorbs co-payments beyond P1,000 per family per financial year
plans.hospital_network: Government and private hospitals in Botswana (scheme-approved providers)
plans.maternity_cover: Normal delivery up to P9,240 per family per annum; Caesarean section up to P14,610 per family per annum
plans.chronic_cover: Chronic Disease Management Program; chronic medicines up to P6,990 per member per annum (pre-authorisation required)
plans.dental_optical: Dental (limited dentistry): P3,630 per family per annum; Optical: Spectacles/contact lenses P1,150 per beneficiary every two years
plans.waiting_period: 9 months for maternity if not previously covered; 12 months for limited dentistry; 2 years for pre-existing conditions (except HIV/AIDS)
